title: Safiorga
text: Les ancêtres des saphiriqs, vivant dans un village reclus du monde
textPreview: Les ancêtres des saphiriqs, vivant dans un village reclus du monde

infoTabs.label: Values
infoTabs.placeholder: What is the ideal life that people aspire to? What virtues are held in greatest esteem? What are the virtues and vices within this culture? What kinds of people are the rebels and outcasts of this society? How does society deal with them?

infoTabs.label: Rituals
infoTabs.placeholder: Traditions and rituals that define this culture. What events/holidays are celebrated and how? How are the dead treated? How do they handle births, coming of age, or marriage?

infoTabs.label: Mythos
infoTabs.placeholder: Legends, fables, and records of the past detailing heroes that define their ethical foundation. What are the most popular stories about the past (a summary paragraph each)? How are these stories passed down? Are some based in fact and ignored? What is their social significance?

infoTabs.label: Expression
infoTabs.placeholder: Architecture, art forms/styles, food, and other cultural exports.

infoTabs.label: History
infoTabs.placeholder: How did this culture form? Where did this culture travel through?
